Create percutaneous drainage columns for long conversion

Source: R/conv_pan.R
make_pan_percdrainage_cols.Rd

Create percutaneous drainage columns for long conversion

make_pan_percdrainage_cols(df)

Arguments

df

a data table to add the columns to

Details

First checks if the data table contains a "pan_percdrainage" column. If so, the column is split into 4 columns according to the regex pattern ",\s?".

Examples

x <- data.table::data.table(
pan_percdrainage = c("Yes-other", "Yes-bile", "Yes-pus", "Yes-amylase-rich fluid",
"Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-pus", "Yes-bile,Yes-other", "Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-pus,Yes-other",
"Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-bile,Yes-other", "Yes-pus,Yes-bile", "Yes-pus,Yes-other",
"Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-pus,Yes-bile", "Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-other",
"Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-pus,Yes-bile,Yes-other", "Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-bile",
"Yes-pus,Yes-bile,Yes-other")
)

nsqipr:::make_pan_percdrainage_cols(x)
x

#>                                      pan_percdrainage      pan_percdrainage1
#>  1:                                         Yes-other              Yes-other
#>  2:                                          Yes-bile               Yes-bile
#>  3:                                           Yes-pus                Yes-pus
#>  4:                            Yes-amylase-rich fluid Yes-amylase-rich fluid
#>  5:                    Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-pus Yes-amylase-rich fluid
#>  6:                                Yes-bile,Yes-other               Yes-bile
#>  7:          Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-pus,Yes-other Yes-amylase-rich fluid
#>  8:         Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-bile,Yes-other Yes-amylase-rich fluid
#>  9:                                  Yes-pus,Yes-bile                Yes-pus
#> 10:                                 Yes-pus,Yes-other                Yes-pus
#> 11:           Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-pus,Yes-bile Yes-amylase-rich fluid
#> 12:                  Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-other Yes-amylase-rich fluid
#> 13: Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-pus,Yes-bile,Yes-other Yes-amylase-rich fluid
#> 14:                   Yes-amylase-rich fluid,Yes-bile Yes-amylase-rich fluid
#> 15:                        Yes-pus,Yes-bile,Yes-other                Yes-pus
#>     pan_percdrainage2 pan_percdrainage3 pan_percdrainage4
#>  1:              <NA>              <NA>              <NA>
#>  2:              <NA>              <NA>              <NA>
#>  3:              <NA>              <NA>              <NA>
#>  4:              <NA>              <NA>              <NA>
#>  5:           Yes-pus              <NA>              <NA>
#>  6:         Yes-other              <NA>              <NA>
#>  7:           Yes-pus         Yes-other              <NA>
#>  8:          Yes-bile         Yes-other              <NA>

#> 10:         Yes-other              <NA>              <NA>

#> 12:         Yes-other              <NA>              <NA>
